modules.description: Provides functions to parse and manipulate Adobe Font Metrics data, including reading character metrics, font bounding boxes, and kerning pairs. Works with structured data types such as records for font headers, character entries, and kerning rules. Used to extract and process font information for rendering engines or typeface analysis tools.

Parses Adobe Font Metrics files, extracting header information, character metrics, kerning pairs, and composite character data. Works with structured types like `header`, `char_metrics`, and `pairwise_kerning` to represent font properties and spacing. Used to analyze font spacing and layout characteristics for typesetting applications.
